entry.title: 伽马分布与泊松分布的联系
entry.content:
电子产品的失效常常是由子外界的 “冲击引起”. 若在 (0,t)\left( {0,t}\right)(0,t) 内发生冲击的次数 N(t)N\left( t\right)N(t) 服从 参数为 λt{\lambda t}λt 的泊松分布,试证第 nnn 次冲击来到的时间 Sn{S}_{n}Sn​ 服从伽玛分布 Ga(n,λ){Ga}\left( {n,\lambda }\right)Ga(n,λ) .

主要要证明的就是(2)式

\small\begin{align*}&\left( 1 \right)\int _{x}^{+\infty }\frac{1}{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right) }{z}^{\alpha - 1}{\mathrm{e} }^{-z}\mathrm{\;d}z = \sum \limits_{ {y = 0} }^{ {\alpha - 1} }\frac{ {x}^{y}{\mathrm{e} }^{-x} }{y!},\;\alpha = 1,2,3,\cdots \\&\left( 2 \right) \sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }=\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^t{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx,\quad\lambda>0 &\\&\left( 3 \right) \sum_{k=0}^{n-1}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }=\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_t^{\infty}{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx,\quad\lambda > 0&\end{align*}

提示：利用分部积分法）并将上式表示成 Poisson 随机变量与伽玛随机变量之 间的概率关系式.

可以看出这三题可以归纳为一题，这里介绍不同的方法：分布积分法证明第一题、用函数的方法证明第二题、第三题是第二题的简单变形

第一题:

proof：

记S(α)=∫x+∞1Γ(α)zα−1e−z  dz,α=1,2,3,⋯S\left( \alpha \right) =\displaystyle\int_x^{+\infty}{\dfrac{1}{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right)} }z^{\alpha -1}\mathrm{e}^{-z}\;\mathrm{d}z,\alpha =1,2,3,\cdotsS(α)=∫x+∞​Γ(α)1​zα−1e−zdz,α=1,2,3,⋯

易得S(1)=e−x=x0e−x1!S\left( 1 \right) =e^{-x}=\dfrac{x^0e^{-x} }{1!}S(1)=e−x=1!x0e−x​ ,
则由分部积分法可得:

\begin{align*}S\left( \alpha \right) &=\displaystyle\int_x^{+\infty}{\frac{1}{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right)} }z^{\alpha -1}\mathrm{e}^{-z}\;\mathrm{d}z&\\&=-\displaystyle\int_x^{+\infty}{\frac{1}{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right)} }z^{\alpha -1}\;\mathrm{de}^{-z}&\\&=\frac{-\mathrm{e}^{-z}z^{\alpha -1} }{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right)}\mid_{x}^{+\infty}+\displaystyle\int_x^{+\infty}{\frac{1}{\Gamma \left( \alpha -1 \right)} }z^{\alpha -2}\mathrm{e}^{-z}\;\mathrm{d}z&\\&=\frac{\mathrm{e}^{-x}x^{\alpha -1} }{\Gamma \left( \alpha \right)}+S\left( \alpha -1 \right) &\end{align*}

由S(α)S(\alpha)S(α)递推式可得:

\begin{align*}S\left( \alpha \right) &=\sum_{i=2}^{\alpha}{\left[ S\left( i \right) -S\left( i-1 \right) \right]}+S\left( 1 \right) &\\&\,\, =\sum_{i=2}^{\alpha}{\left( \frac{\mathrm{e}^{-x}x^{i-1} }{\Gamma \left( i \right)} \right)}+\frac{x^0e^{-x} }{1!}&\\&\,\, =\sum_{i=1}^{\alpha}{\left( \frac{\mathrm{e}^{-x}x^{i-1} }{\Gamma \left( i \right)} \right)}&\\&\,\, \xrightarrow{y=i-1}\sum_{y=0}^{\alpha -1}{\left( \frac{\mathrm{e}^{-x}x^y}{\Gamma \left( y+1 \right)} \right)}=\sum_{y=0}^{\alpha -1}{\frac{x^y\mathrm{e}^{-x} }{y!} }&\end{align*}

证毕

第二题和第三题：

分析:
如果f′(x)−g′(x)=0f^{\prime}\left( x \right) -g^{\prime}\left( x \right) =0f′(x)−g′(x)=0,且f(0)=g(0)f\left( 0 \right) =g\left( 0 \right)f(0)=g(0) 显然有f(x)=g(x)f\left( x \right) =g\left( x \right)f(x)=g(x)

令f(t)=∑k=n∞(λt)kk!e−λt,f(0)=0f\left( t \right) =\displaystyle\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} },f\left( 0 \right) =0f(t)=k=n∑∞​k!(λt)k​e−λt,f(0)=0

\begin{align*}&f^{\prime}\left( t \right) =\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\lambda ^kkt^{k-1} }{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }-\lambda \sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }&\\&=e^{-\lambda t}\left[ \sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\lambda ^kt^{k-1} }{\left( k-1 \right) !}-\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\lambda ^{k+1}t^k}{k!} }} \right] &\\&=e^{-\lambda t}\left[ \sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\lambda ^kt^{k-1} }{\left( k-1 \right) !}-\sum_{k=n+1}^{\infty}{\frac{\lambda ^kt^{k-1} }{\left( k-1 \right) !} }} \right] &\\&=\frac{e^{-\lambda t}\lambda ^nt^{n-1} }{\left( n-1 \right) !}&\\\end{align*}

令g(t)=λnΓ(n)∫0txn−1e−λxdx,g(0)=0g\left( t \right) =\dfrac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^t{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx,g\left( 0 \right) =0g(t)=Γ(n)λn​∫0t​xn−1e−λxdx,g(0)=0

则有:
g′(t)=λnΓ(n)tn−1e−λt=e−λtλntn−1(n−1)!=f′(t){g}^{\prime }\left( t\right) = \dfrac{ {\lambda }^{n} }{\Gamma \left( n\right) }{t}^{n - 1}{e}^{ - {\lambda t} } = \dfrac{ {e}^{ - {\lambda t} }{\lambda }^{n}{t}^{n - 1} }{\left( {n - 1}\right) !} = {f}^{\prime }\left( t\right) g′(t)=Γ(n)λn​tn−1e−λt=(n−1)!e−λtλntn−1​=f′(t)

∵f′(t)−g′(t)=0\because {f}^{\prime }\left( t\right) - {g}^{\prime }\left( t\right) = 0∵f′(t)−g′(t)=0

说明 f(t)−g(t)=C,Cf\left( t\right) - g\left( t\right) = C,Cf(t)−g(t)=C,C 为常数

又 ∵f(0)−g(0)=0\because f\left( 0\right) - g\left( 0\right) = 0∵f(0)−g(0)=0

可得 f(t)=g(t)f\left( t\right) = g\left( t\right)f(t)=g(t)

即 ∑k=n∞(λt)kk!e−λt=λnΓ(n)∫0txn−1e−λxdx\mathop{\sum }\limits_{ {k = n} }^{\infty }\dfrac{ {\left( \lambda t\right) }^{k} }{k!}{e}^{-{\lambda t} } = \dfrac{ {\lambda }^{n} }{\Gamma \left( n\right) }{\displaystyle\int }_{0}^{t}{x}^{n - 1}{e}^{-{\lambda x} }{dx}k=n∑∞​k!(λt)k​e−λt=Γ(n)λn​∫0t​xn−1e−λxdx

第三题是第二题的简单变形

\begin{align*}&\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }&\\&=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }-\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }&\\&=1-\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }&\\&\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_t^{\infty}{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx&\\&=\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^{\infty}{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx-\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^t{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx&\\&=1-\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^t{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dx\end{align*}

由(2)知∑k=n∞(λt)kk!e−λt=λnΓ(n)∫0txn−1e−λxdx\displaystyle\sum_{k=n}^{\infty}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }=\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_0^t{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dxk=n∑∞​k!(λt)k​e−λt=Γ(n)λn​∫0t​xn−1e−λxdx

故∑k=0n−1(λt)kk!e−λt=λnΓ(n)∫t∞xn−1e−λxdx\displaystyle\sum_{k=0}^{n-1}{\frac{\left( \lambda t \right) ^k}{k!}e^{-\lambda t} }=\frac{\lambda ^n}{\varGamma \left( n \right)}\displaystyle\int_t^{\infty}{x^{n-1}e^{-\lambda x} }dxk=0∑n−1​k!(λt)k​e−λt=Γ(n)λn​∫t∞​xn−1e−λxdx

解决了这个恒等式下面这题迎刃而解了

entry.title: 中值定理2和3
entry.content:
其中第二个中值定理有些难度、第一个是很经典的题目。

  1. 设f(x)f\left( x\right)f(x) 在[0,1]\left\lbrack{0,1}\right\rbrack[0,1]上连续,在(0,1)\left({0,1}\right)(0,1)内可导,且f(0)=0,f(1)=1f\left( 0\right) = 0,f\left( 1\right) = 1f(0)=0,f(1)=1,试证对任意 正数a1,a2,⋯ ,an{a}_{1},{a}_{2},\cdots ,{a}_{n}a1​,a2​,⋯,an​,在(0,1)\left( {0,1}\right)(0,1)内一定存在互不相同的nnn个数,0<ξ1<ξ2<⋯<ξn<10 < {\xi }_{1} < {\xi }_{2} < \cdots < {\xi }_{n} < 10<ξ1​<ξ2​<⋯<ξn​<1使得:

a1f′(ξ1)+a2f′(ξ2)+⋯+anf′(ξn)=a1+a2+⋯+an.\frac{ {a}_{1} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{1}\right) } + \frac{ {a}_{2} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{2}\right) } + \cdots + \frac{ {a}_{n} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{n}\right) } = {a}_{1} + {a}_{2} + \cdots + {a}_{n}.f′(ξ1​)a1​​+f′(ξ2​)a2​​+⋯+f′(ξn​)an​​=a1​+a2​+⋯+an​.

  1. 设f(x)f\left( x\right)f(x)在[0,a]\left\lbrack {0,a}\right\rbrack[0,a]上可导(a>0),f(0)=1,f(a)=0\left( {a > 0}\right) ,f\left( 0\right) = 1,f\left( a\right) = 0(a>0),f(0)=1,f(a)=0,证明; 在(0,a)\left( {0,a}\right)(0,a)上存在x1<x2{x}_{1} < {x}_{2}x1​<x2​使得；

f′(x1)f′(x2)=1a2{f}^{\prime }\left( {x}_{1}\right) {f}^{\prime }\left( {x}_{2}\right) = \frac{1}{ {a}^{2} }f′(x1​)f′(x2​)=a21​

note：这两题实际上都是用的介值定理+Lagrange中值定理来证明的

proof

a1f′(ξ1)+a2f′(ξ2)+⋯+anf′(ξn)=a1+a2+⋯+an.\frac{ {a}_{1} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{1}\right) } + \frac{ {a}_{2} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{2}\right) } + \cdots + \frac{ {a}_{n} }{ {f}^{\prime }\left( {\xi }_{n}\right) } = {a}_{1} + {a}_{2} + \cdots + {a}_{n}.f′(ξ1​)a1​​+f′(ξ2​)a2​​+⋯+f′(ξn​)an​​=a1​+a2​+⋯+an​.

等价于证明

a1(a1+a2+⋯+an)f′(ξ1)+a2(a1+a2+⋯+an)f′(ξ2)+⋯+an(a1+a2+⋯+an)f′(ξn)=1 \frac{a_1}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _1 \right)}+\frac{a_2}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _2 \right)}+\cdots +\frac{a_n}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _n \right)}=1(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)f′(ξ1​)a1​​+(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)f′(ξ2​)a2​​+⋯+(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)f′(ξn​)an​​=1

即

∑i=1naif′(ξi)∑i=1nai=1 \sum_{i=1}^n{\frac{a_i}{f^{\prime}\left( \xi _i \right) \sum_{i=1}^n{a_i} }}=1i=1∑n​f′(ξi​)∑i=1n​ai​ai​​=1

由f(x)f\left( x\right)f(x)在[0,1]\left\lbrack {0,1}\right\rbrack[0,1]上连续,在(0,1)\left( {0,1}\right)(0,1)内可导,且f(0)=0,f(1)=1f\left( 0\right) = 0,f\left( 1\right) = 1f(0)=0,f(1)=1可由介值定理知:
存在f(x1)=a1(a1+a2+⋯+an),f(x2)=a1+a2(a1+a2+⋯+an),…,f(xn)=1f(x_1)=\dfrac{a_1}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right)}, f(x_2)=\dfrac{a_1+a_2}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right)},\ldots, f(x_n)=1f(x1​)=(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)a1​​,f(x2​)=(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)a1​+a2​​,…,f(xn​)=1即f(xi)=∑1nai(a1+a2+⋯+an)f(x_i)=\dfrac{\sum_1^n a_i}{\left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right)}f(xi​)=(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)∑1n​ai​​(注意这里这两个端点值xn=1,x0=0x_n=1,x_0=0xn​=1,x0​=0)
则由Lagrange中值定理知:
存在ξi∈(xi−1,xi)\xi_i \in (x_{i-1},x_i)ξi​∈(xi−1​,xi​)，使得:

f′(ξi)=f(xi)−f(xi−1)xi−xi−1=ai(xi−xi−1)(a1+a2+⋯+an) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _i \right) =\frac{f\left( x_i \right) -f\left( x_{i-1} \right)}{x_i-x_{i-1} }=\frac{a_i}{\left( x_i-x_{i-1} \right) \left( a_1+a_2+\cdots +a_n \right)}f′(ξi​)=xi​−xi−1​f(xi​)−f(xi−1​)​=(xi​−xi−1​)(a1​+a2​+⋯+an​)ai​​

显然有0<ξ1<ξ2<⋯<ξn<10 < {\xi }_{1} < {\xi }_{2} < \cdots < {\xi }_{n} <10<ξ1​<ξ2​<⋯<ξn​<1,于是:

aif′(ξi)∑i=1nai=xi−xi−1 \frac{a_i}{f^{\prime}\left( \xi _i \right) \sum_{i=1}^n{a_i} }=x_i-x_{i-1}f′(ξi​)∑i=1n​ai​ai​​=xi​−xi−1​

故

∑i=1naif′(ξi)∑i=1nai=∑i=1n(xi−xi−1)=xn−x0=1 \sum_{i=1}^n{\frac{a_i}{f^{\prime}\left( \xi _i \right) \sum_{i=1}^n{a_i} }}=\sum_{i=1}^n{\left( x_i-x_{i-1} \right)}=x_n-x_0=1i=1∑n​f′(ξi​)∑i=1n​ai​ai​​=i=1∑n​(xi​−xi−1​)=xn​−x0​=1

这一题有些难度、中介点不好找。

f(x)f\left( x\right)f(x)在[0,a]\left\lbrack {0,a}\right\rbrack[0,a]上可导(a>0),f(0)=1,f(a)=0\left( {a > 0}\right) ,f\left( 0\right) = 1,f\left( a\right) = 0(a>0),f(0)=1,f(a)=0,令g(x)=f(x)−xag(x)=f(x)-\dfrac{x}{a}g(x)=f(x)−ax​,则g(0)>0,g(a)<0g(0)>0,g(a)<0g(0)>0,g(a)<0,则由介值定理知存在点c∈(0,a)c \in(0,a)c∈(0,a)使得,g(c)=f(c)−ca=0g(c)=f(c)-\dfrac{c}{a} =0g(c)=f(c)−ac​=0,在(0,ca),(ca,1)(0,\dfrac{c}{a}),(\dfrac{c}{a},1)(0,ac​),(ac​,1)上分别运用Lagrange中值定理可得:

f′(ξ1)=f(c)−f(0)c=c−aacf′(ξ2)=f(a)−f(c)a−c=−ca(a−c) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _1 \right) =\frac{f\left( c \right) -f\left( 0 \right)}{c}=\frac{c-a}{ac}\\f^{\prime}\left( \xi _2 \right) =\frac{f\left( a \right) -f\left( c \right)}{a-c}=\frac{-c}{a\left( a-c \right)}f′(ξ1​)=cf(c)−f(0)​=acc−a​f′(ξ2​)=a−cf(a)−f(c)​=a(a−c)−c​

因此:

f′(ξ1)f′(ξ2)=c−aac−ca(a−c)=1a2 f^{\prime}\left( \xi _1 \right) f^{\prime}\left( \xi _2 \right) =\frac{c-a}{ac}\frac{-c}{a\left( a-c \right)}=\frac{1}{a^2}f′(ξ1​)f′(ξ2​)=acc−a​a(a−c)−c​=a21​

可以看出可以关键一步就是构造辅助函数g(x)=f(x)−xag(x)=f(x)-\dfrac{x}{a}g(x)=f(x)−ax​，这是怎么想到的呢?就是先随便试一个点c、然后分别运用Lagrange中值定理、看看什么时候成立，然后就是找到特殊点

entry.title: 中值定理1
entry.content:
一个中值定理题目

设 f(x)f\left( x\right)f(x) 在 $ \left\lbrack {0,1} \right\rbrack $上二阶可导,且 $f\left( 0\right) = {f} ^{\prime } \left( 0\right) = {f} ^{\prime \prime } \left( 0\right) = f\left( 1\right) = 0 $ ,证明存在 $ \xi \in (0,1)$ 使得：

ξ2f′′(ξ)−2f(ξ)=0{\xi } ^{2} {f} ^{\prime \prime } \left( \xi \right) - {2f} \left( \xi \right) = 0 ξ2f′′(ξ)−2f(ξ)=0

这题我感觉证明起来有些难度、有些步骤不容易想到、先给出答案、最后讲一下我的思路

证明

设$G\left( x \right) =\begin{cases}
\dfrac{f\left( x \right)} {x^2} , x\in \left( 0,1 \right]\
0, x=0\
\end{cases} $ ,易验证G(x)G(x)G(x) 在[0,1]上连续可导
当x≠0x\ne 0x​=0时:

G′(x)=f′(x)x2−2xf(x)x4=f′(x)−2xf(x)x2 G^{\prime} \left( x \right) =\frac{f^{\prime} \left( x \right) x^2-2xf\left( x \right)} {x^4} =\frac{f^{\prime} \left( x \right) -\dfrac{2} {x} f\left( x \right)} {x^2} G′(x)=x4f′(x)x2−2xf(x)​=x2f′(x)−x2​f(x)​

entry.title: 随机向量
entry.content:
随机向量

均值向量与协方差阵

一些结论

随机向量的期望和协方差矩阵

设 nnn 维随机向量 X=(X1,X2,⋯Xn)′\mathbf{X} = \left( {X}_{1},{X}_{2},\cdots {X}_{n} \right)^{\prime}X=(X1​,X2​,⋯Xn​)′，若其每个分量的数学期望都存在，则称：

E(X)=(E(X1),E(X2),⋯ ,E(Xn))′E\left( \mathbf{X} \right) = \left( {E\left( {X}_{1} \right), E\left( {X}_{2} \right), \cdots, E\left( {X}_{n} \right) } \right)^{\prime}E(X)=(E(X1​),E(X2​),⋯,E(Xn​))′ 为 nnn 维随机变量 X\mathbf{X}X 的数学期望向量。

nnn维随机向量 XXX 的协方差矩阵定义为:

\begin{align*} \mathrm{Cov}\left( \mathbf{X} \right) &= E\left( \left( \mathbf{X} - E\left( \mathbf{X} \right) \right) \left( \mathbf{X} - E\left( \mathbf{X} \right) \right)^T \right) \\ &= \left[ \begin{matrix} \mathrm{Var}\left( X_1 \right) & \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_1, X_2 \right) & \cdots & \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_1, X_n \right) \\ \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_2, X_1 \right) & \mathrm{Var}\left( X_2 \right) & \cdots & \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_2, X_n \right) \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_n, X_1 \right) & \mathrm{Cov}\left( X_n, X_2 \right) & \cdots & \mathrm{Var}\left( X_n \right) \\ \end{matrix} \right]\end{align*}

定理：E(Y)E\left( Y \right)E(Y)

设 AAA 为 m×nm \times nm×n 非随机矩阵，XXX 和 bbb 分别为 n×1n \times 1n×1 和 m×1m \times 1m×1 随机向量，记 Y=AX+bY = AX + bY=AX+b，则

E(Y)=AE(X)+E(b).E\left( Y \right) = AE\left( X \right) + E\left( b \right).E(Y)=AE(X)+E(b).

推论

tr⁡(Cov⁡(X))=∑i=1nVar⁡(Xi)\operatorname{tr}(\operatorname{Cov}\left( X \right)) = \sum_{i=1}^{n}\operatorname{Var}\left( X_i \right)tr(Cov(X))=∑i=1n​Var(Xi​)，这里 tr⁡A\operatorname{tr}AtrA 表示方阵 AAA 的迹，即对角元素之和。

定理

设 XXX 为 n×1n \times 1n×1 随机向量，则它的协方差阵必为半正定的对称阵。

定理

设 AAA 为 m×nm \times nm×n 阵，XXX 为 n×1n \times 1n×1 随机向量，Y=AXY = AXY=AX，则 Cov⁡(Y)=ACov⁡(X)A′\operatorname{Cov}\left( Y \right) = A \operatorname{Cov}\left( X \right) A^{\prime}Cov(Y)=ACov(X)A′。

定理

设 XXX 和 YYY 分别为 n×1,m×1n \times 1, m \times 1n×1,m×1 随机向量，AAA 和 BBB 分别为 p×n,q×mp \times n, q \times mp×n,q×m 非随机矩阵，则

Cov⁡(AX,BY)=ACov⁡(X,Y)B′.\operatorname{Cov}\left( AX, BY \right) = A \operatorname{Cov}\left( X, Y \right) B^{\prime}.Cov(AX,BY)=ACov(X,Y)B′.

随机向量的二次型

定理：E(X′AX)E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right)E(X′AX)

设 E(X)=μ,Cov⁡(X)=ΣE\left( X \right) = \mu, \operatorname{Cov}\left( X \right) = \SigmaE(X)=μ,Cov(X)=Σ​，则

E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right) = \mu^{\prime}A\mu + \operatorname{tr}\left( A\Sigma \right).\tag{1}\label{期望}

注: 证明用到结论 tr(E(A))=E(tr(A))\mathrm{tr}\left( E\left( A \right) \right) = E\left( \mathrm{tr}\left( A \right) \right)tr(E(A))=E(tr(A))

推论

设 E(X)=μ,Cov⁡(X)=ΣE\left( X \right) = \mu, \operatorname{Cov}\left( X \right) = \SigmaE(X)=μ,Cov(X)=Σ，则

E(X′AX)=μ′Aμ+tr⁡(AΣ).E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right) = \mu^{\prime}A\mu + \operatorname{tr}\left( A\Sigma \right).E(X′AX)=μ′Aμ+tr(AΣ).

  • 若 μ=0\mu = 0μ=0 则 E(X′AX)=tr⁡(AΣ)E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right) = \operatorname{tr}\left( A\Sigma \right)E(X′AX)=tr(AΣ)。
  • 若 Σ=σ2I\Sigma = \sigma^2 IΣ=σ2I，则 E(X′AX)=μ′Aμ+σ2tr⁡(A)E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right) = \mu^{\prime}A\mu + \sigma^2 \operatorname{tr}\left( A \right)E(X′AX)=μ′Aμ+σ2tr(A)。
  • 若 μ=0,Σ=I\mu = 0, \Sigma = Iμ=0,Σ=I，则 E(X′AX)=tr⁡(A)E\left( X^{\prime}AX \right) = \operatorname{tr}\left( A \right)E(X′AX)=tr(A)。

样本方差是总体方差的无偏估计

例题 1

假设一维总体的均值为 μ\muμ，方差为 σ2\sigma^2σ2。X1,⋯ ,XnX_1, \cdots, X_nX1​,⋯,Xn​ 为从此总体中抽取的随机样本，试求样本方差

的均值，这里 Xˉ=1n∑i=1nXi\bar{X} = \frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n} X_iXˉ=n1​∑i=1n​Xi​。

常规解法:

易得：

E(Yi)=0,E(Yi2)=D(Yi)+E2(Yi)=σ2E\left( Y_i \right) = 0, E\left( Y_i^2 \right) = D\left( Y_i \right) + E^2\left( Y_i \right) = \sigma^2E(Yi​)=0,E(Yi2​)=D(Yi​)+E2(Yi​)=σ2

因此 E(Yˉ2)=1n2E(∑i=1nYi2+2∑i≠jnYiYj)=σ2nE\left( \bar{Y}^2 \right) = \frac{1}{n^2} E\left( \sum_{i=1}^n Y_i^2 + 2 \sum_{i \ne j}^n Y_i Y_j \right) = \frac{\sigma^2}{n}E(Yˉ2)=n21​E(∑i=1n​Yi2​+2∑i​=jn​Yi​Yj​)=nσ2​

故 E(Yi−Yˉ)2=E(Yi2−2YiYˉ+Yˉ2)=σ2−2nE(Yi2+∑j≠iYiYj)+σ2n=n−1nσ2E\left( Y_i - \bar{Y} \right)^2 = E\left( Y_i^2 - 2 Y_i \bar{Y} + \bar{Y}^2 \right) = \sigma^2 - \frac{2}{n} E\left( Y_i^2 + \sum_{j \ne i} Y_i Y_j \right) + \frac{\sigma^2}{n} = \frac{n-1}{n} \sigma^2E(Yi​−Yˉ)2=E(Yi2​−2Yi​Yˉ+Yˉ2)=σ2−n2​E(Yi2​+∑j​=i​Yi​Yj​)+nσ2​=nn−1​σ2

再由期望的线性可加性可得 E(S2)=nn−1n−1nσ2=σ2E \left( S^2 \right) = \frac{n}{n-1} \frac{n-1}{n} \sigma^2 = \sigma^2E(S2)=n−1n​nn−1​σ2=σ2。

记 X=(X1,X2,⋯ ,Xn)′\mathbf{X} = \left( X_1, X_2, \cdots, X_n \right)^{\prime}X=(X1​,X2​,⋯,Xn​)′，EnE_nEn​ 为 nnn 阶单位矩阵，InI_nIn​ 为元素全为 1 的 nnn 阶矩阵，

Xˉ=(Xˉ,Xˉ,⋯ ,Xˉ)′=1nInX\mathbf{\bar{X}} = \left( \bar{X}, \bar{X}, \cdots, \bar{X} \right)^{\prime} = \frac{1}{n} I_n \mathbf{X}Xˉ=(Xˉ,Xˉ,⋯,Xˉ)′=n1​In​X

\begin{align*} &\sum_{i=1}^n \left( X_i - \bar{X} \right)^2 \\ &= \left( \boldsymbol{X} - \bar{\boldsymbol{X}} \right)^{\prime} \left( \boldsymbol{X} - \bar{\boldsymbol{X}} \right) \\ &= \left( \boldsymbol{E}_{\boldsymbol{n}} \boldsymbol{X} - \frac{1}{n} I_n \boldsymbol{X} \right)^{\prime} \left( \boldsymbol{E}_{\boldsymbol{n}} \boldsymbol{X} - \frac{1}{n} I_n \boldsymbol{X} \right) \\ &= \boldsymbol{X}^{\prime} \boldsymbol{C}^{\prime} \boldsymbol{C} \boldsymbol{X} \\ &= \boldsymbol{X}^{\prime} \boldsymbol{C} \boldsymbol{X}\end{align*}

又因为 (En−1nIn)(1,1,⋯1)′=0\left( \boldsymbol{E}_{\boldsymbol{n}} - \frac{1}{n} I_n \right) \left( 1, 1, \cdots 1 \right)^{\prime} = 0(En​−n1​In​)(1,1,⋯1)′=0，故 μ′Cμ=0\boldsymbol{\mu }^{\prime} \boldsymbol{C} \boldsymbol{\mu } = 0μ′Cμ=0

由于 Xi,XjX_i, X_jXi​,Xj​ 相互独立、方差为 σ2\sigma^2σ2 故 Σ=σ2En\Sigma = \sigma^2 E_nΣ=σ2En​，易得 tr(C)=n−1\mathrm{tr}(C) = n - 1tr(C)=n−1

故
